channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- Apex One, OfficeScan, Worry-Free Business Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro -- Apex One, OfficeScan, Worry-Free Business Security

item.title: CVE-2019-9489|2024-08-04T21:54:44.231Z -- trend%20micro -- apex%20one%2C%20officescan%2C%20worry-free%20business%20security
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability in Trend Micro Apex One, OfficeScan (versions XG and 11.0), and Worry-Free Business Security (versions 10.0, 9.5 and 9.0) could allow an attacker to modify arbitrary files on the affected product's management console.
